snippet: Carlos Gonzalez, who had homered in his last three at-bats, hit a three-run homer in the first inning, and Colorado beat visiting Houston, 11-5, to complete a sweep.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Colorado Rockies defeat Houston Astros, 11-5; Rockies outfielder Carlos Gonzalez hits a three-run homer, making him the first Rockies player to go deep in four consecutive at-bats; other results noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and RICHARD SANDOMIR

lead_paragraph: Carlos Gonzalez, who had homered in his last three at-bats, hit a three-run homer in the first inning, and Colorado beat visiting Houston, 11-5, to complete a sweep.

headline.seo: Gonzalez Homers in Fourth Straight At-Bat for Rockies
headline.main: Gonzalez Homers in Fourth Straight At-Bat, Powering Rockies
headline.print_headline: Gonzalez Homers in Fourth Straight At-Bat, Powering Rockies
